text_block_list.text: After Sakura Bakushin O didn't show up to practice, the next morning……when I headed to the Trainer's office, I heard a strange voice.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Welcome, Trainer! We have just finished the banners for the press conference!
Surprised, I look down at her feet and saw a banner that read…… "Sakura Bakushin O, Apology Conference!" spread out on the floor.
choice_data_list: You don't have to go that far…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But I do! As the exemplary class president, I have to draw the line!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, I will begin my apology conference! I am well and truly, deeply, honestly…… sorry!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: On the Bakushin road that goes straight down… I forgot myself, I began to run… and before I knew it, it was night…!
choice_data_list: Alright, just be careful next time.
Okay, just be careful next time.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I promise! I will never be tempted again!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And now! I plan to use this banner as a quilt!!
…She expressed enough remorse that I stopped her from going that far.
